name: Smallies - Web Surfing Girl
description:
Smallies are the little folks living in the Metaverse/ their daily activities are pretty much similar like use in the real world. Although they're doing it in their unique way, from mundane activities all the way to exciting and fun one. follow these little guys activities in the Metaverse and get a glimpse on what living inside the Metaverse is like.


 Currently this is Phase one of the series. and there will be more of these guys doing more of their daily activities. But as the project move forward, in the next phase there's going to be be narrative involved. In this phase it wont be just random animations, but its going to have narrative to it, and when all of the videos are played together in series, it will form a short movie.
